text.div:
Severe Sepsis

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    1092571000119109 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to Chromobacterium (disorder)
    1092581000119107 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to coagulase negative Staphylococcus (disorder)
    1092591000119105 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to Enterococcus (disorder)
    1092601000119103 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Gonococcus (disorder)
    1092611000119100 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Gram-positive bacteria (disorder)
    1092631000119105 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to Group A streptococcus (disorder)
    1092641000119101 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction due to Group B streptococcus (disorder)
    127271000119106 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by anaerobic bacteria (disorder)
    127291000119107 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Gram-negative bacteria (disorder)
    127301000119108 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Haemophilus influenzae (disorder)
    127311000119106 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Meningococcus (disorder)
    127321000119104 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    127331000119101 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by methicillin susceptible Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
    127341000119105 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Pneumococcus (disorder)
    127351000119107 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Pseudomonas (disorder)
    127361000119109 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Salmonella (disorder)
    127381000119100 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Serratia (disorder)
    127391000119102 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Staphylococcus (disorder)
    127401000119100 Severe sepsis with acute organ dysfunction caused by Streptococcus (disorder)
